title: Tara's mulch garden
creator_credit: Jon Pedersen, Rex Tasker and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: This is a simple, poetic film about mulching. Tara Callaghan explains the principle of her garden, takes us through the different growing phases, and leaves us with a splendid harvest of healthy vegetables.
creator_credit_for_label: Jon Pedersen, Rex Tasker and National Film Board of Canada
